\w And|strong="H1980"\w* Absalom said \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w*, \w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* thy \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*? \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w wentest|strong="H1980"\w* \w thou|strong="H1980"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*?
